column16:
Parking spaces: "Recreation: As required by the Development Review Board" (Page 50). "The Jackson Gore Recreational District shall include 165.84 acres. This district provides for 326
residential dwelling units, 8 non-residential buildings including a Recreation/Health Center" (Page 42).
column20: "Uses allowed as a permitted or conditional use in the underlying zoning district require the approval of the Development Review Board as a conditional use in accordance with Section 260 and the supplemental district standards set forth below" (Page 45).
